#summary Quick view of the different features

= Introduction =

The program only handle one image at a time.
First open an image by clicking "File -> Open Image"


= Features =

== LSB Enhancement ==

The most famous visual attack, described in :
_Attacks on Steganographic Systems_
_Andreas Westfeld and Andreas Pfitzmann_
 
Just extract the LSB of each pixel
(or LSB of red, green and blue value for RGB images).

If LSB = 1 then set pixel value to 255
If LSB = 0 then set pixel value to 0
